intro.headline: WELCOME TO THE SHOW!
intro.paragraph:
This is an implementation of the Monty Hall problem. Play as many rounds as you want and remember that you can enter "?" at any time to have a look at the statistics. If you are not sure what this is all about, check out the Wikipedia article: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Monty_Hall_problem .
If you are already familiar with the topic, you may have a look at config.json for even more doors and goats.
